Post Text: When we launched ClickFunnels, things didn't go well.We tried five times, and nothing clicked.Then one day, as we were testing different funnels, Todd had this idea. And this is the difference between us making $10 million a year and $200 million a year.It was so small and simple.Todd suggested encouraging people to get a free trial on the thank-you page instead of talking about ClickFunnels.And that's what we did.We directed them to the MIFGE, the Most Incredible Free Gift Offer.We didn't know what the business was going to look like.But after the first year, we had 2,500 members who had paid us $997 each.That alone amounted to $2.5 million, which was fantastic in itself.But what truly sets this apart is the linchpin, the secret sauce:7,500 people continued their memberships after the trial, paying $97 per month.And that's $750,000 per month in recurring revenue, totaling $9 million a year.We almost went for the $2.5 million business we thought was going to be the greatest thing in the world.But this one little piece—the MIFGE made the difference between a $2.5 million business and a $9 million one.

Post Text: Eighteen years ago, I made a significant purchase—the MIFGE.It got me into Dan Kennedy's world, and you might be wondering,"What in the world is MIFGE?"It stands for "Most Incredible Free Gift Offer."MIFGE is designed to help you make maximum money in minimum time. The offer does not have to be free.It can be a paid offer too.The key is that it must be so irresistible, you'd be insane to say no.We applied this concept when we built the ClickFunnels MIFGE.We started driving traffic to it, and the results were astonishing.When we attract customers to ClickFunnels by sending them directly to clickfunnels.com, it costs us around $150 to $250 for someone to sign up for a free trial.However, when we direct traffic to the MIFGE, it costs only about $100 for the same trial.But guess what?When someone buys a MIFGE, they encounter not just the MIFGE itself but also an order form bump, an upsell, and a down-sell.This means we earn $300 for every person who takes advantage of the MIFGE.In other words, I can now spend up to $300 to acquire a ClickFunnels customer and still break even.It might sound crazy, but it works.The MIFGE is a simple yet powerful concept— an offer so tempting that it gets people to join your continuity program.That's how you make your business grow.

Post Text: Here's my best advice for how to talk crap about somebody you hate.​This is a secret I learned from one of my favorite authors of all time, Napoleon Hill.​This is what he said, "If you must speak ill of another don't speak it. Instead, write it in the sand next to the water's edge."​So, what Hill is basically saying is that don't do it.​I get it. It's tempting, especially in the age of social media, when you might feel compelled to vent about someone who's been bothering you for a while.​But here's the thing:​1. Words have a lasting impact.​What you say can stick around for a long time, and you wouldn't want to regret it later.​2. A more effective strategy is to write out your feelings privately and then delete it.​Expressing your thoughts on paper can be therapeutic, but sharing them publicly isn't always the best move.​Writing allows you to release those emotions without causing harm.​3. Remember, the words you use reflect on you.​Speaking negatively about others says more about you than them.​Be mindful of the impact your words may have on your own image.​So, if you ever feel the urge to badmouth someone, resist it.​Trust me, your life will be much better if you choose not to engage in negativity.​Choose kindness and positivity in your interactions.

Post Text: This is the golden rule of direct response marketing and why funnels out-convert websites every single time.Let me break it down:Traditional websites often lead to confusion.When visitors land on a website, they're bombarded with countless links and options.That's confusing right away.But funnels are simple.When someone lands on a funnel page, there's just one clear path.For example, the first page asks for an email.That's it.The next page might show a video, guiding you to purchase a single product.And the next, maybe an irresistible upsell or downsell.The secret is that funnels spell it out for your customers.What to do, when to do it, and how to do it.No distractions, no guesswork.

Post Text: I'm a big fan of Napoleon Hill's "Magic Ladder of Success," specifically rung number 8.​It's about the habit of performing more work and better work than you are paid to perform.​I like to call this the principle of over-delivering.​Whether it's in your job, relationships, marriage, parenting, or any other aspect of life, always go above and beyond.​If you're paid $50 an hour, give $100 an hour worth of effort.​Over time, this dedication to over-delivering will be recognized, and your value will soar.​This principle applies to all aspects of life.​If you overdeliver in relationships, your connections will thrive.​The same goes for your marriage, parenting, career, sports, and business.​Whether it's serving customers or excelling in athletics, consistently exceeding expectations is the key to ensuring your success.​Remember, the habit of over-delivering is a powerful tool that not only increases your value.​It also guarantees your path to success.​So, always do more than you are paid for, always overdeliver.
